comments:
I'm using version 2.0.0.v20070810-1700 with the Trac connector. I clicked on the "Preview" button under Description and received the following error. I tried this with the internal web browser as well as an external web browser with no difference.

Created an attachment (id=76919)
workaround that filters about urls

Unfortunately I can't reproduce this due to a lack of a Windows / IE environment. 

Rob, please review and merge the patch. It's not a perfect fix but it could help and shouldn't break anything.

Closing for now. The fix will become available in the next dev build / release which is due today.

David, please reopen if the problem persists.
The patch works beautifully. Thanks for the quick turn-around and this very nice new feature.
